changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_buildings') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_buildings GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_buildings @building_id dbo.id_t OUT, @min_id dbo.id_t, @max_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT @building_id = ISNULL(MAX(id), @min_id) FROM dbo.Buildings WHERE id >= @min_id AND id <= @max_id
SELECT b.id, b.building_code, b.pos_x, b.pos_y, b.pos_z, b.pos_heading, b.hp, b.state, b.build_at, b.expire_at, b.onwer_type, b.onwer_character_id, b.onwer_guild_id, c.nickname, g.guild_name, g.guild_mark_code, b.create_at FROM dbo.Buildings AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON b.onwer_character_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN Guilds AS g ON b.onwer_guild_id = g.id WHERE b.id >= @min_id AND b.id <= @max_id
SELECT building_id, item_id, item_code, slot_id, item_count, inven_type, expire_at FROM dbo.Building_Inventories WHERE building_id >= @min_id AND building_id <= @max_id
SELECT building_id, item_id, socket_count, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Building_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE building_id >= @min_id AND building_id <= @max_id
SELECT building_id, item_id, socket_slot_id, gem_code, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Building_Equip_Item_Socket_Infos WHERE building_id >= @min_id AND building_id <= @max_id
SELECT building_id, item_id, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Building_Accessory_Item_Infos WHERE building_id >= @min_id AND building_id <= @max_id
SELECT building_id, recipe_code, count, complete_at FROM dbo.Building_Select_Recipe_Production_Infos WHERE building_id >= @min_id AND building_id <= @max_id
SELECT building_id, id, npc_code, pos_x, pos_y, pos_z, pos_heading, expire_at FROM dbo.Building_Guards WHERE building_id >= @min_id AND building_id <= @max_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
